statements: SELECT * FROM infrastructure_damage_status_reports WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT id, damage_location FROM infrastructure_damage_status_reports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT damage_description FROM infrastructure_damage_status_reports WHERE damage_location = 'Building A';
SELECT id, status FROM infrastructure_damage_status_reports WHERE report_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM infrastructure_damage_status_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM infrastructure_damage_status_reports WHERE status = 'InProgress' ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT id, damage_location FROM infrastructure_damage_status_reports WHERE damage_description LIKE '%major%' AND status = 'Completed' LIMIT 5
SELECT report_date, damage_description FROM infrastructure_damage_status_reports WHERE damage_location = 'Building A' AND status = 'Pending'
SELECT * FROM infrastructure_damage_status_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY report_date ASC
SELECT id, damage_description, status FROM infrastructure_damage_status_reports WHERE damage_location IN ('Building A', 'Building B')
SELECT * FROM InfrastructureDamageReports;
SELECT report_id, damage_type, report_date FROM InfrastructureDamageReports WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT reported_by, report_date, status FROM InfrastructureDamageReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RepairDecisions WHERE repair_type = 'structural';
SELECT decision_maker, decision_date FROM RepairDecisions ORDER BY decision_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM InfrastructureDamageReports WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, damage_type, report_date, status FROM InfrastructureDamageReports WHERE damage_type = 'Flood';
SELECT report_id, reported_by, status FROM InfrastructureDamageReports WHERE status IN ('Rejected', 'Pending') ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RepairDecisions WHERE repair_type = 'Replacement' AND decision_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT decision_id, report_id, repair_type, decision_maker FROM RepairDecisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM infrastructure_damage;
SELECT location, damage_type, status FROM infrastructure_damage;
SELECT id, location FROM infrastructure_damage WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM repair_reports WHERE repair_cost > 1000;
SELECT decision_id, recommended_action, decision_date FROM decision_making ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM infrastructure_damage WHERE status='Under Repair';
SELECT location, damage_type FROM infrastructure_damage ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT repair_description, repair_cost FROM repair_reports WHERE repair_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM decision_making ORDER BY decision_date ASC;
SELECT recommended_action FROM decision_making WHERE decision_date='2022-08-15';
SELECT * FROM InfrastructureDamageReports;
SELECT location, damage_type FROM InfrastructureDamageReports WHERE location='City Hall';
SELECT report_date, damage_description FROM InfrastructureDamageReports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, damage_type, report_date FROM InfrastructureDamageReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, location, damage_type, damage_description FROM InfrastructureDamageReports WHERE damage_type='Flood';
SELECT * FROM InfrastructureDamageReports ORDER BY report_date DESC, damage_type ASC
SELECT location, damage_type FROM InfrastructureDamageReports WHERE location LIKE 'City%'
SELECT report_id, damage_description FROM InfrastructureDamageReports WHERE damage_type = 'Flood' AND report_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT report_id, damage_type, report_date FROM InfrastructureDamageReports WHERE damage_type = 'Fire' ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT r.report_id, r.repair_type, r.repair_cost, d.decision_notes FROM RepairRequests r JOIN DecisionMakingLogs d ON r.request_date = d.decision_date
SELECT * FROM DamageReports;
SELECT location, damage_type, status FROM DamageReports WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT inspector_name, findings FROM Inspections ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM DecisionMaking WHERE decision_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT team_name, team_lead, contact_number FROM RepairTeams WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM DamageReports;
SELECT location, report_date FROM DamageReports WHERE damage_type = 'Flood';
SELECT team_name, team_lead, contact_number FROM RepairTeams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT inspection_date, inspector_name, findings FROM Inspections WHERE inspection_id = 1;
SELECT decision_id, decision_date, decision_maker, rationale FROM DecisionMaking WHERE decision_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
